title.narrative: Supporting China's strategic development of its technology and satellite industries to promote international innovation and collaboration

description.narrative: The project is designed to draw on UK expertise to support China's development of a roadmap that identifies specific challenges and opportunities in its emerging technology and satellites industries. This will include supporting China's strategic development of satellite applications and data management and sharing mechanisms. China's technology and satellite industries are ones that underpin almost all of China's development priorities, including agriculture, health care, climate change, monitoring air pollution, and urban development. The project is intended to open international, academic, industrial and government collaboration. It supports China's intention to move to a sustainable economic model led by innovation, in line with China's Five-year plan. It is also expected to generate opportunities for international businesses, including UK ones.
